biotools.summary:
accurately estimating protein-protein binding affinity change upon mutations using evolutionary profiles in combination with an optimized physical energy function.

binding affinity change estimation.

SSIPe is a method to calculate binding affinity changes (ΔΔGbind) of protein-protein interactions (PPIs) upon mutations at protein-protein interface.

Please direct questions and inquiries to our Service System Discussion Board or contact Dr.

Estimation of binding affinity change upon mutations at protein-protein interface
